explains: n. 遗迹；残余；退化的器官

sentences.en: There's not a vestige of truth in the rumour.
sentences.cn: 这个谣传毫无真实可言。

sentences.en: We represent the last vestige of what made this nation great – hard work.
sentences.cn: 我们代表了曾经使这个国家伟大的仅存的品质–勤奋。

sentences.en: Or is it just a harmless vestige of some ancient pagan ritual?
sentences.cn: 或者它仅仅是一些古老的异教仪式无害的痕迹？
